text:
Today we're learning English with this hilarious 
episode from Friends where Ross and Joey

love taking naps together. You'll learn 20 sleep 
idioms and expressions while laughing along with

all the jokes. By the way in case you're new here 
we help you to learn fast English without getting

lost, without missing the jokes and without 
subtitles. Just like Abdul who highly recommends

our channel because he says it's so effective! 
So if that sounds good to you don't forget to

hit that subscribe button and the bell down below 
so that you don't miss any of our new lessons!

Did you know that Friends is actually known 
as the best TV series to learn English with

this is why I highly recommend our Fluent with 
Friends course. In this 48 week course you'll

learn with the first two seasons of Friends. 
You'll receive PDF power lessons every week,

vocabulary memorization software, access to our 
Fluency Circle Global Community and so much more

and the best part is you can try it right now for 
free with our Three-part Masterclass! All you have

to do is click up here or down in the description 
box below to learn more and sign up now just!

If you enjoy learning different 
expressions and phrases then I

highly recommend you check out this lesson 
that I made on our Real Life English channel

where you can learn more than 55 
phrases for daily conversation!

You can click up here or down in the 
description box below to watch that lesson next!
